year- revealed on the show today( 03.02.11) that she and partner DJ Darren Emerson split some time ago, but have remained close in order to protect their two-year-old son Ben. She said: As you ladies are aware I separated from Darren Emerson some time ago and we have worked through this together. We have come to terms with it now and are now able to speak about it. Every relationship where a child is involved is born out of love. There is a little boy in the middle and he has to come first. There is an overwhelming emotion of sadness but it doesn't make me want to scream and shout. It makes me want to learn from it. "I wouldn't watch the show now because it would be like seeing your ex-boyfriend with his new girlfriend." Kate Thornton and Darren Emerson started dating in 2004 and got engaged in 2007. " But in this week's Arts& Leisure section, Jon Caramanica argues that the Aerosmith frontman's wacky charisma has ably replaced Simon Cowell 's caustic derision as the show's signature quality. Simon Cowell Steven Tyler , who will turn 63 next month, has done much of the heavy lifting for "Idol' this season, Simon Cowell Caramanica writes, "helping keep the show within striking distance of last season"s ratings and ensuring that even though certain things have been lost in transition, the show still has a steady center."
